attributes.action:
STUDENT VOICE !
REDUCE CONTENT AND WORK LOAD FOR ALL STUDENTS TAKING 2022 EXAMS
attributes.additional_details: In the current climate all student and teacher have been under immense pressure trying to teach content on exam board.As one body we find that all students across England have been punished for something that is not our fault escalating mental health, depression and well being.The way forward is reducing content and work load for all students taking the 2022 exams as they have fallen behind and focusing on solution to tackle the 2023 exams ensuring students have the full support and knowledge.
attributes.background: Student across England have been put under tremendous amounts of pressure and stress due to the pandemic. Having a huge impact of mental health and depression. Being the future of the UK economy we would want exam boards to reduce content and work load for students taking exams in 2022.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Cancel A-level and GCSE exams 2022
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566760

Amend GCSE exam content for children that are now in year 9 and year 10
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568162

Review 2022 exam arrangements for GCSEs and A-levels
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566569

Reduce content for 2022 A-level and GCSE exams
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566803
